CONTLNAM.title: CONTLNAM
CONTLNAM.description: Last name: End Page - CONTNAMEpage If CONTFNAM.Response.Coded = {na} and CONTMNAM.Response.Coded = {na} and CONTLNAM.Response.Coded = {na} Then If QUEXLANG = {ESN} Then CONTFNAM.Errors.AddNew("err_1","Por favor, entra un nombre.") Else CONTFNAM.Errors.AddNew("err_1","Please enter a name.") End If Goto LabelCONTNAME End If If CONTFNAM.Response.Coded.ContainsAny({dontknow,refused,noanswer}) and CONTMNAM.Response.Coded.ContainsAny({dontknow,refused,noanswer}) and CONTLNAM.Response.Coded.ContainsAny({dontknow,refused,noanswer}) Then Goto LABEL_ADMINCONSENT End If
